ItemTagsSettings.Hint: Edit defined tags alongside the interactions related to them.

GeneralSettings.Title: Module General Settings
GeneralSettings.Hint: Fine tune the features to your desire.
GeneralSettings.Label: Settings

DefaultAttackHook.Title: Default Attack Hook
DefaultAttackHook.Hint: The hook used to trigger the effects

CpLocation.Title: Copper Pieces Location
CpLocation.Hint: Where are copper pieces data located inside actors

SpLocation.Title: Silver Pieces Location
SpLocation.Hint: Where are silver pieces data located inside actors

GpLocation.Title: Gold Pieces Location
GpLocation.Hint: Where are gold pieces data located inside actors

PpLocation.Title: Platinum Pieces Location
PpLocation.Hint: Where are platinum pieces data located inside actors

EpLocation.Title: Electrum Pieces Location
EpLocation.Hint: Where are electrum pieces data located inside actors

DefaultThrowableDestructionChance.Title: Default Throwable Destruction Chance
DefaultThrowableDestructionChance.Hint: Percentage that defines the default chance of throwables being destructed on impact

DefaultAmmunitionDestructionChance.Title: Default Ammunition Destruction Chance
DefaultAmmunitionDestructionChance.Hint: Percentage that defines the default chance of ammuntion being destructed on impact

RemoveThrowableItem.Title: Remove Throwable Item
RemoveThrowableItem.Hint: Whether or not throwable items get removed from the inventory when thrown

AddThrowableToTargetInventory.Title: Add Throwable Item to Target Inventory
AddThrowableToTargetInventory.Hint: Whether or not throwable items get added to the target inventory when hit

AddAmmunitionToTargetInventory.Title: Add Ammunition Item to Target Inventory
AddAmmunitionToTargetInventory.Hint: Whether or not ammunition items get adedd to the target inventory when hit

CreateItemPilesOnMiss.Title: Create Item Piles on Miss
CreateItemPilesOnMiss.Hint: Whether or not Item Piles will be created when a projectile misses the target

MinifyItemPilesNames.Title: Minify Item Piles Names
MinifyItemPilesNames.Hint: Whether or not Item Piles generated by the module will have a minified name

SetElevationOfItemPiles.Title: Set Elevation of Item Piles
SetElevationOfItemPiles.Hint: Whether or not Item Piles created by this module should have elevation set based on target's elevation

PowerfulImpactShakeEffect.Title: Powerful Impact Shake Effect
PowerfulImpactShakeEffect.Hint: Whether or not powerful impacts will have a screen shake effect

LightingItemsAutomation.Title: Lighting Items Automation
LightingItemsAutomation.Hint: Whether or not lighting items should be automated with tags

CurrencyGenerator.Title: Currency Generator
CurrencyGenerator.Hint: Whether or not actors will have their currency generated
